title: Inferno Fork
summaries: The Inferno Fork is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that fires a moderately slow-moving fireball which explodes into a large, damaging cloud of fire that lasts for two seconds upon contact with an enemy or surface. The initial fireball and the resulting explosion also inflicts damaged enemies with the (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Hellfire / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) On Fire! debuff for 8â€“15 seconds. The Inferno Fork has a 1/20 (5%) / 59/800 (7.38%) chance to drop from Diabolists found in the post-Plantera Dungeon.

statistics.Knockback: 5 (Average) (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 8 (Very strong) (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Tooltip: Launches a ball of fire that explodes into a raging inferno
statistics.Sell: 6 GC
